Title: Our first Spring in the Wilderness
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Educated youth, sent to the countryside, happily spreading fertilizer over the rice fields. Behind them a blackboard with a slogan to "Study theory" (学理论). The characters on the red flag: 创业队 - Pioneering team.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
